snippet.title: There's something wrong with... Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
It’s a first-person horror experience set in the eerie and enigmatic tunnels.
As players navigate through dark passages, they will discover notes, interactive objects, and unusual human remains.

However, not everything within those tunnels is lifeless. Players will encounter a dangerous creature.
The monster cannot be defeated or even harmed. The only viable approach will be to rely on stealth and hiding tactics.

The game does not feature a traditional Inventory system. By using a special tool called the Replicator, players will be able to copy specific elements of the environment and paste them onto other unique areas.

There's something wrong with... game on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2836580/Theres_something_wrong_with/

The House of E. game on Itch.io:
https://gamenasticastudios.itch.io/theres-something-wrong-with

Voice by Sebastian Volkov
https://twitter.com/GodOfHorror
https://www.youtube.com/@Sebastian_Volkov

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Follow us on Twitter
Twitter: https://twitter.com/gamenastica
